subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Newbie question again
author: Stefan Bion
full_text:
Hi,

but if you look at some YouTube videos of hacked radios, e.g.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_E2JRNrmN1c
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hoXFgN8FtAY
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A8PZo2PzrRk

you could almost get the impression of a 2-way communication...

BTW, I think that Spiricom voices sound much diffrent from the box clips
and any other EVPs I've heard - they sound more like Vocoder voices.

Stefan

-- 

> Holly,

> Frank's Box, Joe's Box and the Mini Box clips are similar to the audio
> with the Spiricom. The RS Hacks were not designed for the purpose of
> two way communication, where as the actually boxes were. I think in my
> opinion that the audio gotten then is just as good as the
> communication we are getting now (which is just my own thoughts).
   
> I think that the more people who's curiosity gets the better of them
> to try this form of communication, the stronger the audio becomes!
   
>        Juli
